title: A1990 and A2141 replacement keyboards vendors
message:
Hello,
I apologize if this is not the right place to ask, but I didnt find which of the forum section (Macbook Logic Board Repair, Tools, Business talk, Off topic, iPhone, Diet...) was the most relevant for that.

I will have to buy a few replacement keyboards (and Touchbar) for A1990 and A2141 MBP next week; how reliable are the replacements parts wrt original ? Any recommendation in terms of vendor? Given the time it takes, I don't want to have to replace the replacement keyboard...

Also, on store.rossmann, keyboard section, there is no replacement parts for A1990/A2141. There are for A1706, but not after. Is there any specific reasons to this, such as unavailability or lack of reliability ?

Also, what kind of tool do you use to thread the new holes, so that the screws stay in place in the rivets' holes ?

Thanks for your time,

KR
S.
